cause.description:
Polio was lifted off the shoulders of u.s. citizens a few generations back, but that doesn't mean that it doesn't still exsist. Polio Plus is an orginization that works to bring the polio vaccine to places in africa, where polio is still a threatening issue.
1. Polio Vaccines need to be spread throughout the world
cause.mission: eradicate Polio in third world countries
cause.name: polio plus
